entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Is there an API syntax node that allows developers to get error messages through error messages? #58503
  • Move static members to another type does not use the correct visibility #58502

Closed

  • Line-end errors overlap with the line content #58501
  • Suggestion: Lower specific calls to String.StartsWith to faster code #58504

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow valid metadata name characters in source generator hint names #58506
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix branch link in language feature status #58505
    Area-Compilers, Community

Merged

  • Semi auto implemented properties #57076
    Area-Compilers, Community

Updated

  • Fix Integration test MetadataReference #58204
    Area-IDE
  • Stack Trace Explorer improvements #58458
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Add support for interpolations in raw string literals. #57979
    Area-Compilers
  • Synthesize delegate types for lambdas with parameter types or return type that are not valid type arguments #57295
    Area-Compilers
  • Avoid race condition in map for TupleElementIndex #58500
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Tuples
  • Report level 7 name warning for `record` when langversion is below 9 #58452
    Area-Compilers
  • Improve error reporting for 'this()' initializer from 'record struct' constructor #58430
    Area-Compilers
  • Make IOperation.ChildOperations public #52923
    Area-Compilers
  • Cache the delegate for static method group conversions. #58288
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Support Pattern Matching ReadOnlySpan<char> on constant string #44388
    Area-Compilers, Community, Compiler.Next
